humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " female " and " some ", the original meaning is marriage. "Shuowen": "Muye, seek for two surnames. From female, a certain voice." "Zhuangzi‧ Fables": "My father is not a matchmaker for his son."

" Matchers " can mean people who are in marriage. "Poetry‧Binfeng‧Fake": "How about taking a wife? Bandits can't match up." Zheng Xuanjian: "A matchmaker can understand the words of the two surnames and decide the way of the family."

" Media " also guides and recommends. "Liezi·Zhou Muwang": "Song Yangli Huazi's middle-aged illness forgets... Lu You Confucian can cure it by self-media."

" Media " also guides the recommended person. "Songs of the Chu-Nine Chapters-Reflecting": "It is not only a lonely man, but also an unscrupulous matchmaker."

" Media " also means media and incentives. Han Jiayi's "New Book: Dadu": "Most ministers are suspicion of the country, ministers are suspicious of the lord, and the mediator of chaos."

" Media " also means to cause and attract. Tang Wei Yingwu's "Bing Fu": "When the qi surpasses the sky, dry the yin and yang; drink it internally to help the disease."

" Media " can also instruct and seek. Song Li Gang's "Book with Mei He Sheng Shi Lang": "Only knowing that you are gentle, you can match the wealth and honor."

humanum_full_description:
從「女」，「某」聲，本義為說合婚姻。《說文》：「謀也，謀合二姓。从女，某聲。」《莊子‧寓言》：「親父不為其子媒。」

　　「媒」可表示說合婚姻的人。《詩‧豳風‧伐柯》：「取妻如何？匪媒不得。」鄭玄箋：「媒者，能通二姓之言，定人室家之道。」

　　「媒」也指引薦、推薦。《列子‧周穆王》：「宋陽里華子中年病忘……魯有儒生自媒能治之。」

　　「媒」亦指引薦的人。《楚辭‧九章‧抽思》：「既惸獨而不群兮，又無良媒在其側。」

　　「媒」還表示媒介、誘因。漢賈誼《新書‧大都》：「臣聞大都疑國，大臣疑主，亂之媒也。」

　　「媒」亦表示導致、招引。唐韋應物〈冰賦〉：「氣奪天時，干陰陽也；內熱飲之，媒其疾也。」

　　「媒」還能指謀取、營求。宋李綱《與梅和勝侍郎書》：「惟知佞柔，以媒富貴。」
